EmailTemplate.name: Testing Webinar Model-Based Test Automation EMEA.Email Model Based Test Automati
EmailTemplate.subject: Brought to by Tricentis, the Tosca Suites Webinar Series: Model- Based test Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Tricentis Clients and Partners,
With over 200 attendees, Accelerator 2013 is one of the largest functional testing events in Europe and features keynotes and session tracks from experts across all regions and industries.
Choose your own schedule from more than 20 presentations covering topics such as Mobile, Agile, Test Management, Next Gen - Test Automation and Risked Based Testing.
A full reception will follow the day's proceedings - networking at its best.
Register and attend the Accelerate 2013 <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/register> and you will be automatically entered in a drawing to win an iPad Mini.
To view the full agenda and learn more about the event,visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/en/solutions-day?utm_source=Event&utm_medium=E-Mail&utm_campaign=Accelerate_2013>
I look forward to meeting you in person.
Best Regards,
Ajay Murthy Chief Marketing Officer Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
© 2013 TRICENTIS Technology & Consulting. All Rights Reserved.
